mapUrl.label: Map URL
mapUrl.tooltip: Enter a Google Maps URL containing the business location

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.tooltip: Enter keywords separated by commas (e.g., pizza, italian restaurant)

radius.label: Radius
radius.tooltip: Select the search radius around the business location

distance.label: Distance
distance.tooltip: Select a distance value less than the radius

description.label: Description (Spin text allowed)
description.tooltip: Enter a description. Spin text syntax is supported: {option1|option2|option3}

businessDetails.label: Business Details
businessDetails.tooltip: Enter business details in format: Business Name - URL

relatedSearches.label: Related Searches
relatedSearches.tooltip: Enter related search terms separated by commas
